posts.post_title: FS/FT T206  American Beauty, Sovereign, Polar Bear
posts.post_content:

Freeman AB (SOLD)
Shannon PB $20 
Arellanes PB $20 
Konetchy Sov 150 (SOLD)
Lattmore PB $20 

I could send pics of the backs..just need your email. Thanks
Joe
